Description: Rim and wall sherd of East Greek pottery plate; broad ledge rim set off on top by rounded ridge from wall; slipped cream. Interior:stopt maeander on top of rim; ridge glazed; at top of wall, two bands, zig-zag frieze and further band; to centre, remains of lotus flower and bud band; no assured traces of added colour; exterior: four bands at top of wall and bottom of rim.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GO.311)
